EmailTemplate.name: Australian Shipping Carriers (GTM-1153).Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: What Australian shipping carriers do you use?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
BigCommerce Shipping Survey: What Australian shipping carriers do you use? I’d like invite you to take a short 3 minute survey that I’ll use to understand how I can improve the BigCommerce’s shipping options for you! Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
I'm a Product Manager at Bigcommerce and am performing customer research to learn more about how you ship your products domestically within Australia and internationally from Australia. I’d like invite you to take a short 3 minute survey that I’ll use to understand how I can improve the BigCommerce’s shipping options for you!
Start the Survey <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/G58ZKN8]]> Thank you in advance for your feedback
Jordan Sim Product Management
